messages.text: Alright tell me, is she an introvert or extrovert?
What else about her should I know about her?
Idk, why don't we just wait for her to come home.
I guess she’s an introvert, she doesn’t talk to anyone besides me really
That’s an interesting thing to ask about
Well, I just want to know more about it, just a harmless question. She seems super cool.
She is, and she's coming back right now.
They don’t really have a good relationship
Idk I don’t really want to tell a stranger all about her personal life. Let's just wait till she gets back.
She’s very distant from them and they don’t see each other much. Speaking of, she's coming back right now.
